posts.title: Balance Board
posts.content: Get a heart-pumping core workout without needing a whole room of machines using this balance board. This lightweight and portable piece of exercise equipment is designed to help increase flexibility, range of motion, and blood flow in addition to balance and posture.

posts.title: Automatic Jar Opener
posts.content: Stop wasting your time trying to open jars with those puny noodles you call arms – because now you can employ the services of the automatic jar opener and easily pop up the top of your favorite foods while weeping over your diminutive physique.

posts.title: Interlocking Portable Eating Utensils
posts.content: There’s no excuse for eating like a savage when venturing into the great outdoors when you bring along these interlocking portable eating utensils. Whether you need a spoon, fork, or knife, this ultra compact package has it all.

posts.title: Giant Dog Tongue Chew Toy
posts.content: The giant dog tongue chew toy is the ultimate pet toy. It’s made from non-toxic solid natural rubber and contains a ball and tongue combo great for playing fetch, posing for hilarious pictures or cracking people up on the street as you and your loyal companion pass them by.

posts.title: Pumpkin Tap Kit
posts.content: Harness mother nature’s fruits like never before with the keg tap kit. Now you’ll be able to appease the gods of the autumn ales by pouring their succulent nectar into a keg worthy of the name. It’s the festive and eco-friendly way to store and dispense booze.

posts.title: Aerating Wine Glass
posts.content: Instantly improve your wine’s taste by pouring it into the aerating wine glass. Each hand-blown glass comes with a small aerating fountain at the center that disperses wine out over several different spouts, infusing oxygen into the wine to release more flavor.

posts.title: Orthopedic Support Pillow
posts.content: Avoid discomfort while you’re lounging around with this orthopedic support pillow. This four piece comfort system features a furniture grade polyurethane foam base, a memory foam layer, and is topped off with an ultra soft bamboo fabric for utmost comfort.

posts.title: Water Draining Soap Holder
posts.content: Keep your bar of soap from becoming all gross and mushy by storing it on the water draining soap holder. This cleverly functional design holds the bar at a sloping angle, allowing excess water to drain off, keeping the soap nice and dry.

posts.title: Bike Mounted Bluetooth Speaker
posts.content: Enjoy your favorite tunes on the go by equipping your bicycle with this practical bike mounted Bluetooth speaker. It’s water resistant so you can ride in any weather and comes with enough juice to run up to 10 hours, making it ideal for the two-wheeled audiophile.

posts.title: Snail Jelly Mask
posts.content: Get the young, radiant, and slimy looking skin you’ve always yearned for by using these snail jelly masks. Each mask comes coated with real snail secretion, which has been known to have a variety of regenerative effects on the skin.

posts.title: Changeable Letter Board
posts.content: Have some fun with words – the old school way – by writing whatever you want on this changeable letter board. This black felt board comes with tons of letters, numbers, and punctuation characters so that you can spell out anything that comes to your mind.

posts.title: Wrench Cutlery Set
posts.content: Add some testosterone to mealtime by chowing down using these wrench utensils. They’re crafted from steel for unmatched durability and come with a novelty wrench design at the base that any bonafide handy man will love.
